River Island cocktail dress, size 42 but I had it slightly adjusted (by a professional) to a smaller fit, so probably fits better on size 40 and height around 160. The dress is STUNNING, will get you all the compliments and you‚Äôll shine like a diamond‚ú® 25‚Ç¨. Please DM for more info or extra item pics. Pick up in Tallinn city center.
